mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, external_userid, corp_id, oper_userid, remark, description, create_time, remark_corp_name, remark_mobiles, qq, address, email, add_way, state, status, delete_time FROM we_flower_customer_rel WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.sql: select external_userid, name, avatar, type, gender, unionid, birthday, corp_name, corp_full_name, position, is_open_chat, create_time from we_customer

select wc.external_userid, wc.name, wc.avatar, wc.type, wc.gender, wc.unionid, wc.birthday, wc.corp_name, wc.corp_full_name, wc.position, wc.is_open_chat, wt.tag_id from we_customer wc left join we_flower_customer_rel wfcr on wc.external_userid = wfcr.external_userid and wfcr.status = 0 left join we_flower_customer_tag_rel wfctr on wfctr.flower_customer_rel_id = wfcr.id right join we_tag wt on wt.tag_id = wfctr.tag_id and wt.status = 0
mapper.select:
SELECT user_id,external_userid FROM we_customer_extend_property_rel
(user_id,external_userid ) IN ( SELECT user_id ,external_userid FROM we_customer_extend_property_rel WHERE (corp_id=#{item.corpId} AND extend_property_id=#{item.extendPropertyId} AND property_value like concat('%', #{item.propertyValue}, '%')) )
GROUP BY user_id,external_Userid

SELECT wfcrf.flower_customer_rel_id, wt.tag_id, wt.`name` as tagName, wt.group_id FROM we_flower_customer_tag_rel wfcrf LEFT JOIN we_tag wt ON wt.tag_id = wfcrf.tag_id where wt.status = 0 and wfcrf.flower_customer_rel_id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO we_customer (`external_userid`, `unionid`, `name`, `avatar`, `type`, `gender`, `corp_id`, `corp_name`, `corp_full_name`, `position`) VALUES
( #{item.externalUserid},#{item.unionid},#{item.name},#{item.avatar}, #{item.type},#{item.gender},#{item.corpId},#{item.corpName}, #{item.corpFullName},#{item.position} )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `name` = VALUES(`name`),avatar = VALUES(avatar),corp_name = VALUES(corp_name), corp_full_name = VALUES(corp_full_name),position = VALUES(position),`type` = VALUES(`type`),gender = VALUES(gender) , unionid = VALUES(unionid)
mapper.select: SELECT wc.`name`, wfcr.remark, wfcr.remark_mobiles, wc.birthday, wfcr.email, wfcr.address, wfcr.qq, wc.position, wfcr.remark_corp_name, wfcr.description, wfcr.id as flowerCustomerRelId, wfcr.user_id, wc.avatar, wfcr.external_userid, wc.gender, wc.type, wc.corp_name, wc.corp_full_name FROM we_customer wc LEFT JOIN we_flower_customer_rel wfcr on wc.external_userid = wfcr.external_userid and wc.corp_id = wfcr.corp_id WHERE wfcr.corp_id = #{corpId} and wc.external_userid = #{externalUserid} and wfcr.user_id = #{userid} limit 1

SELECT wu.user_id, wu.user_name FROM we_flower_customer_rel wfcr LEFT JOIN we_user wu ON wu.user_id = wfcr.user_id AND wu.corp_id = wfcr.corp_id WHERE wfcr.corp_id = #{corpId} AND external_userid = #{customerId} AND wfcr.status = '${@com.easyink.common.enums.CustomerStatusEnum@NORMAL.code}' ORDER BY wfcr.create_time DESC

SELECT DISTINCT external_userid, unionid, name, type FROM we_customer WHERE corp_id = #{corpId}
AND name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
